title: Gene Simmons Thanks Kiss Fans for ‘Kind Wishes’ as He Recovers From Car Accident: ‘It Happens. Especially to Those of Us’ Who Are ‘Horrible Drivers’
summary: Kiss bassist and co-founder Gene Simmons is recovering after being involved in a car accident in Malibu. Simmons was released from a hospital on Tuesday and has since extended his gratitude to fans concerned about his health. “Thanks, everybody, for the kind wishes,” Simmons posted on social media …
